name: Escape from Monster Dimension
description:
This is a 8 bit shoot em up for Sega Master System where you are a wizard that's been accidentaly teleported to a hostile dimension.

This game has been designed to be played on a Sega Master System emulator. It has been mostly tested on Emulicious, but should work on most emulators. It may or may not run on real hardware.

Github repo: https://github.com/haroldo-ok/escape-from-monster-dimension
